channel.title: GM on 无关紧要的宇宙
channel.description: Recent content in GM on 无关紧要的宇宙

item.title: Why GM’s CEO is still betting on electric vehicles (and racing)
item.description: GM was the first major US automaker to make the promise to go all-electric by 2035, just four years ago. Those promises have since turned into rough estimates under the second Donald Trump presidency,
